00010     // For use in writing other filters
00011     class SoundFilter : public Sound
00012     {
00013     protected:
00014       SoundPtr client;
00015 
00016     public:
00017       SoundFilter(SoundPtr c) : client(c) {}
00018       void play() { client->play(); }
00019       void stop() { client->stop(); }
00020       void pause() { client->pause(); }
00021       bool isPlaying() const { return client->isPlaying(); }
00022       void setVolume(float f) { client->setVolume(f); }
00023       void setPan(float f) { client->setPan(f); }
00024       void setPos(float x, float y, float z)
00025       { client->setPos(x,y,z); }
00026       void setPitch(float p) { client->setPitch(p); }
00027       void setRepeat(bool b) { client->setRepeat(b); }
00028       void setRange(float a, float b=0, float c=0)
00029       { client->setRange(a,b,c); }
00030       void setStreaming(bool b) { client->setStreaming(b); }
00031 
00032       // The clone() function is not implemented here, as you will
00033       // almost certainly want to override it yourself
00034     };
00035 
00036     class FactoryFilter : public SoundFactory
00037     {
00038     protected:
00039       SoundFactoryPtr client;
00040 
00041     public:
00042       FactoryFilter(SoundFactoryPtr c) : client(c)
00043       {

00045         has3D = client->has3D;
00046         canLoadFile = client->canLoadFile;
00047         canLoadStream = client->canLoadStream;
00048         canLoadSource = client->canLoadSource;
